segments.text: Kata ! You've got a beautiful singing voice . You hit the high notes perfectly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for your compliment . But you are exaggerating . I think you are destined to be a singer . You have the best voice !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . Maybe we can sing a song together . Would you like to sing with me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'd like to . It's my honor . Let's pick a song .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry , I can't sing the song .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . But I'm not familiar . I don't know the beginning part .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Never mind . You can follow me . I'll sing the first part .
segments.speaker: S1
